TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapTypeAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 控制類別執行個體被序列化為 SOAP 編碼 XML 時， 所產生的結構描述。

span.span: Controls the schema generated by the when a class instance is serialized as SOAP encoded XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別都屬於一系列屬性可控制如何序列化或還原序列化為編碼 SOAP XML 物件。The class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML. 產生的 XML 符合全球資訊網協會 (www.w3.org) 文件 < Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1 」 的第 5 節。The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1". 相似的屬性完整清單，請參閱 < [ 控制編碼 SOAP 序列化的屬性](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). 若要將物件序列化為編碼的 SOAP 訊息，建構使用以建立方法類別。To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, construct the using an created with the method of the class. 只能套用至類別宣告。The can only be applied to class declarations. 屬性會決定是否要將產生的 XML 項目類型包含在產生的 XML 資料流的 XML 結構描述文件 (.xsd)。The property determines whether the resulting XML element type is included in the XML Schema document (.xsd) for the generated XML stream. 若要查看結構描述，請將類別編譯成 DLL 檔案。To see the schema, compile the class into a DLL file. 將產生的檔案傳遞做為引數[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。Pass the resulting file as an argument to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 此工具會產生 XML 結構描述的執行個體所序列化的類別時產生的 XML 資料流類別。The tool generates the XML Schema for the XML stream generated when the class is serialized by an instance of the class. 當類別序列化時，產生的 XML 資料流不同的結構描述 (.xsd) 檔案寫 Xsd.exe 就會設定不同的命名空間。Setting a different namespace causes Xsd.exe to write a different schema (.xsd) file for the XML stream generated when the class is serialized. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別，與設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class, with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立時覆寫之型別的序列化。Create a when overriding the serialization of a type. 將物件指派給的屬性並加入至。Assign the object to the property of a and add the to a . 請參閱如需詳細資訊覆寫 SOAP 序列化的類別概觀。See the class overview for more details about overriding SOAP serialization. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立時覆寫之型別的序列化。Create a when overriding the serialization of a type. 將物件指派給的屬性並加入至。Assign the object to the property of a and add the to a . 請參閱如需詳細資訊覆寫 SOAP 序列化的類別概觀。See the class overview for more details about overriding SOAP serialization. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. param.span: XML 型別的名稱，是 序列化類別執行個體時所產生的 (並且對類別執行個體進行還原序列化時所辨識的)。

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定該型別的名稱和 XML 命名空間。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and specifies the name and XML namespace of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立時覆寫之型別的序列化。Create a when overriding the serialization of a type. 將物件指派給的屬性並加入至。Assign the object to the property of a and add the to a . 請參閱如需詳細資料覆寫 SOAP 序列化的類別概觀。See the class overview for more details on overriding SOAP serialization. 如果您設定多個類型的值 (亦即，如果您將屬性套用至多個具有不同的類別時，才每個值)，則[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)會產生不同的每個類型的結構描述檔案 (.xsd)。If you set a value for more than one type (that is, if you apply the attribute to more than one class with a different value for each one), the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) generates a separate schema file (.xsd) for each type. 這是因為每個類型設定不同的命名空間會呈現每一種類型不同於其他讓所需的每個型別寫出做為獨立的實體。This is because setting a different namespace for each type renders each type distinct from the others, which makes it necessary for each type to be written out as an independent entity. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否將型別包含在 SOAP 編碼的 XML 結構描述文件中。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to include the type in SOAP-encoded XML Schema documents.

value.span: 若要在 SOAP 編碼 XML 結構描述文件中包含型別，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to include the type in SOAP-encoded XML Schema documents; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用至類別宣告來指定是否要在 XML 結構描述文件中包含的類型。Apply the to a class declaration to specify whether to include the type in the XML schema document. 若要查看屬性的設定結果類別、 編譯您的應用程式可執行檔或 DLL，並將傳遞至產生的檔案[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the properties of the class, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 工具會將寫入結構描述，包括當類別序列化時，產生的 XML 資料流的型別定義。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition of the XML stream generated when the class is serialized. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 型別的命名空間。

span.span: Gets or sets the namespace of the XML type.
The namespace of the XML type.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定多個類型的值 (亦即，如果您將屬性套用至多個具有不同的類別時，才每個值)，則[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)會產生不同的每個類型的結構描述檔案 (.xsd)。If you set a value for more than one type (that is, if you apply the attribute to more than one class with a different value for each one), the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md) generates a separate schema file (.xsd) for each type. 這是因為每個類型設定不同的命名空間會呈現每一種類型不同於其他讓所需的每個型別寫出做為獨立的實體。This is because setting a different namespace for each type renders each type distinct from the others, which makes it necessary for each type to be written out as an independent entity. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TypeName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TypeName : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 型別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the XML type.
The name of the XML type.
The default is the class name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用至類別，以指定 XML 型別的命名空間、 XML 的型別名稱，以及是否要包含在 XML 結構描述文件中的類型。Apply the to a class to specify the XML type's namespace, the XML type name, and whether to include the type in the XML Schema document. 若要查看設定結果物件的屬性，您應用程式編譯為可執行檔或 DLL，並傳遞至產生的檔案[XML 結構描述定義工具 (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md)。To see the results of setting the object's properties, compile your application as an executable or DLL, and pass the resulting file to the [XML Schema Definition Tool (Xsd.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-schema-definition-tool-xsd-exe.md). 此工具會將結構描述，包括型別定義。The tool writes the schema, including the type definition. ## Examples 下列範例會序列化類別，名為`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 套用至類別設為"SoapGroupType 」。The is applied to the class with the set to "SoapGroupType". 也覆寫，變更到 「 小組 」。The is also overridden, changing the to "Team". 這兩個版本都會加以序列化，導致兩個檔案：SoapType.xml 和 SoapType2.xml。Both versions are serialized, resulting in two files: SoapType.xml and SoapType2.xml. [!code-cpp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CPP/soaptype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/CS/soaptype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapTypeAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapTypeAttribute Example/VB/soaptype.vb#1)]
